title: the second time who says he has my ip address and he will come to KILL me
body:
09/04/2016
[10:11PM] AndyMaaate: ill ******* murder you
[10:11PM] FOREVEJK: 1v1
[10:11PM] AndyMaaate: i have your ip adress :) cya
[10:11PM] FOREVEJK: come



btw, how to put a pic in?

replies.body:
Tell the Nerd you live in an apartment complex and IP address would DO SHIT to locate your exact unit.

He will then get mad lolz!

Hi Forevejk,

**The Boards are not the right place to report players**, and I must ask you to remove the player's name as it is against the[ boards rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) to name and shame.

For cases like this, please send in a support ticket to Riot, detailing what happened as well as any evidence you may have (screenshots). Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue. 

Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.
